items.sentence: The doctor advised my father to cut down on smoking.
That building was leveled in last year's earthquake.
Several young boys were watching us from a distance.
How did you know Tom was planning to move to Boston?
How much money do you have in your pocket right now?
Tom's plan sounded much more reasonable than Mary's.
I didn't get to bed until after midnight last night.
How long did it take you to persuade Tom to do that?
I want you to know that I'll always be here for you.
Promise me you'll never do anything like that again.
